snippet: Heart surgery will prevent Jim Nabors from performing “Back Home Again in Indiana” at this year’s Indianapolis 500, a speedway spokesman said.
abstract: Actor/singer Jim Nabors will not sing this year at the Indianapolis 500 because he is undergoing heart surgery.
lead_paragraph: Heart surgery will prevent Jim Nabors from performing “Back Home Again in Indiana” at this year’s Indianapolis 500, a speedway spokesman said.
